author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.

author: Jacques Cousteau
quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: When the well is dry, we know the worth of water.

author: Sylvia Earle
quote: No water, no life. No blue, no green.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
quote: Be like a river, be fluid and strong.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world — just like water wears away rock.

author: David Whyte
quote: Water listens, water moves, water is patient.

author: John Lennon
quote: You don't need water when you're well, but you can't live without it when you're thirsty.

author: Rachel Carson
quote: The human race is challenged more than ever before to demonstrate our mastery, not over nature but of ourselves.

author: Chief Seattle
quote: Humankind has not woven the web of life. We are but one thread within it.
